pageTitle: Silverglo #306 - 4 Bedroom Deluxe Condominium - Aspen Colorado vacation rental
textBeforeTable: Additional Details: (Passes to the Aspen Club & Spa can be obtained from any Frias front desk during regular business hours.) All Frias Properties of Aspen guest receive complimentary passes to the Aspen Club & Spa, the valley's premier full-service spa and workout facility. During ski season the Silverglo provides shuttle transportation to downtown Aspen and the Silver Queen Gondola. Complex amenities at the Silverglo Condominiums include on-site check-in and front desk services, on-site laundry room, outdoor heated pool, on-site free parking, complimentary Aspen airport transfers, complimentary Wi-Fi and an on-site group gathering room. Unit amenities include an updated kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances, a formal dining area, a laundry closet, and flatscreen TVs in the main living area and all bedrooms. This top floor 4-bedroom, 4-bath deluxe condominium features hardwood floors and two wood-burning fireplaces in the main living area, dining area and kitchen, and is only four blocks to the Silver Queen Gondola and downtown Aspen. Silverglo Condo Complex: Contact Us
textAfterTable: Property Location: Check-in Location: 940 Waters Avenue Reviews for Silver Glo Unit 306 Average Rating: 4 of 5 1 of 1 reviews "Silver-Glo #306...We'll Take It!!!" 4 of 5 Newly updated unit with extremely comfortable furnishings. More than adequate for a family of 4-5. fairly centrally located just blocks from Aspen's main ski lift, market and liquor store...provided us with all the comforts of home. Would and will, recommed to all Aspen-interested visitors. Only opportunity with the unit, internet access was spotty with inconsistent signal strength. -Annual September Aspen Visitor on 10/02/2009
